title: Edelman Out For The Year, Burfict Suspended Again (Football 8/28)
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson and Pete Prisco discuss the impact of Julian Edelman's season-ending injury (:53), and whether the Patriots are still the Super Bowl favorite (4:11). Our trio of NFL experts react to another suspension issued to Bengals LB Vontaze Burfict (8:51), and Kirk Cousins' continued preseason struggles (15:27). The guys also breakdown 3 starting quarterbacks being named over the weekend, including; DeShone Kizer in Cleveland (29:22), Mike Glennon in Chicago (32:21), and Blake Bortles in Jacksonville (35:05). And SPOILER ALERT, Nick, Will and Pete of course pick apart the Game of Thrones season finale (42:38).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
